definition: (genetics) a segment of DNA that is involved in producing a polypeptide chain, resolve into factors
details:
noun
- (genetics) a segment of DNA that is involved in producing a polypeptide chain
= synonyms: gene
- an independent variable in statistics
- an abstract part of something
= synonyms: component
- anything that contributes causally to a result
= example: anything that contributes causally to a result
- a businessman who buys or sells for another in exchange for a commission
= synonyms: agent, broker
- any of the numbers (or symbols) that form a product when multiplied together
- one of two or more integers that can be exactly divided into another integer
= example: one of two or more integers that can be exactly divided into another integer
= synonyms: divisor
verb
- resolve into factors
= example: resolve into factors
= synonyms: factor in, factor out
- consider as relevant when making a decision
= example: consider as relevant when making a decision
= synonyms: factor in, factor out
- be a contributing factor
= example: be a contributing factor
